Version Upgrades
Version - 7.1

3 min
what's new? review the brief release notes for the ops v7 1 featured videos watch the videos for some of the latest features released in version 7 1 store module corporate wise settings corporate wise settings get the collection of all corporate settings clubbed under a setting section manage account links manage account links admin gets to manage the account links of store customers hiding price label hiding price label disable the price visibility and hide the price lable simultaneously for the store shipping module address validation feature address validation feature validate your customer's address with the google's validation feature blind shipping feature blind shipping feature sell without disclosing your identity using the blind shipment feature shipment label generation shipment label generation generate order’s shipment package from a single screen for different orders shipping price for quotes shipping price for quotes give customers a peek into estimated shipping charges for the requested quote shipping markup feature shipping markup feature efficiently manage the shipping costs of varying order rates with the new markup feature google address auto suggestion google address auto suggestion validate the address of customers leaving no room for any unrecognized address designer studio custom art & logo maker custom art & logo maker design promotional products, banners, labels, etc with incredible clip arts and fonts proofing tool features proofing tool features experience more advanced features while proofing the uploaded designs admin module branch store management branch store management branch admin can now gets quote access and can assign orders to other branches
